title: live MFT parsers
extract: : MFT Parsers Reviewed. ... A way to quickly review these systems for Indicators of Compromise (IOCs) is to grab the MFT file rather than take a full disk image. The MFT file is much smaller in size than a disk image and can be parsed to show existing as well as deleted files on a system.Sep 20, 2015
extract_html: : MFT Parsers Reviewed. ... A way to quickly review these systems for Indicators of Compromise (IOCs) is to grab the MFT file rather than take a full disk image.
